3: G-grandpa, I'm back. The city's been secretly throwing out lots of weird trash in the past few days. I collected them all and traded them in for some rye bread!
It's not a lot... But we won't have to starve for the next few days!
Karen, Karen you're back! Grandpa is not hungry, so little Karen can have all the bread.
Oh! That must've been the snoring of those pesky rats in the house!
Right! Karen! Come, come. Move this to the grounds outside!
It's a bit heavy... What is this, Grandpa?
I modified it myself. I'm going to give it to you as a secret birthday present on your birthday!
Come help Grandpa move it out and test it!
